sentences.en: A baby may frequently get a bout of hiccups during or soon after a feeding.
sentences.cn: 婴儿在进食时或进食后常常会打一阵嗝儿。

sentences.en: A recent sales hiccup is nothing to panic about.
sentences.cn: 用不着为最近销售上出现的一点小问题感到惊慌。

sentences.en: Chest pain and stuffiness, palpitation, ischemia of coronary artery, asthma, hiccup, etc.
sentences.cn: 胸痛、胸闷 、 心悸 、 冠状动脉供血不足, 哮喘 、 呃逆等.

sentences.en: Chronic hiccup is an intractable disease and its pathogenesis is still unclear.
sentences.cn: 慢性呃逆是一不易治疗的疾病,其发生机制尚不明确.

sentences.en: Economic hiccup: Much like 1998, all of this gets worked out fairly quickly.
sentences.cn: 经济受阻: 很像1998年, 所有的问题会很快地解决.

sentences.en: In the middle of the prayer there was a loud hiccup from my son.
sentences.cn: 祷告做到一半,我儿子大声打了个呃.

sentences.en: In the middle of the prayer there was a loud hiccup from the priest.
sentences.cn: 祷告做到一半,牧师大声打了个呃.

sentences.en: It contains many features of Jackson's vocal style, including the vocal hiccup he is known for.
sentences.cn: 这张专辑里面,杰克逊充分发挥了自己的发音风格, 包括世人熟知的“间断发音”.

sentences.en: Objective To assess the therapeutic effect of Depakin in intractable hiccup after stroke.
sentences.cn: 目的观察德巴金对卒中后顽固性呃逆的疗效.

sentences.en: She was still hiccuping from the egg she had swallowed whole.
sentences.cn: 她还在因为先前整个吞下鸡蛋而打嗝儿。

sentences.en: Soon you shall hear and feel the belly of this planet roar, hiccup belch and spew.
sentences.cn: 很快你们会听到感觉到这个星球的腹部轰鸣, 呃逆,迸发,喷涌.

sentences.en: There's been a slight hiccup in our mailing system.
sentences.cn: 我们的邮政系统临时出了一点小问题.

sentences.en: This article described the etiology, pathogenesis, diagnosis and treatment hiccup in detail.
sentences.cn: 本文就其病因学 、 发生机制 、 诊断及治疗作一详细叙述.

sentences.en: This one defeat was the only hiccup in the team's steady progress up the League.
sentences.cn: 这次失利只是球队在朝联赛稳步前进的道路上唯一的小挫折.

sentences.en: When you have to hiccup, drink a glass of cold water.
sentences.cn: 当你不得不打嗝时, 喝一杯冷水就好了.

trans.tran_cn: 嗝，连续地打嗝，暂时性的小问题，短暂的停顿
trans.tran_en: a sudden repeated stopping of the breath, usually caused by eating or drinking too fast
